thread.title: Family of man killed by drunk driver awarded $2.7 million

title: Family of man killed by drunk driver awarded $2.7 million
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
The family of a man killed by a hit-and-run driver has been awarded $2.7 million by a Denver jury.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
